author: pedrohenriquebufulin
content:
I've been researching into NFTs, and one think that I'm not sure of, is that if the content of the NFT can private. I mean, I would like a way to issue an NFT that it's content can only be viewed by the owner and maybe some part of it can be public.
I mean, I know that ownership and transaction info needs to be public by default, but isn't there a way to make the actual data of the NFT private? (and I mean only accessible by the owner of the NFT)
